name: Armored War
description:
Armored War is a realistic tactical first-person shooter set in the realities of modern conflict. Take part in ground battles using a full arsenal of weapons and equipment.

    Features:

  • Realistic battles

  • Variety of different locations

  • Several game modes

  • Weapons with customization and attachments

  • Character customization with camouflages

  • Air vehicles for support

Game in Beta stage, you may notice bugs and shortcomings. There is only one developer
